casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1943.

(May 3, 1943.) In the Matter of the Accounting of Babylon National Bank & Trust Company, as Successor Trustee under the Will of Prince H. Foster, Deceased. Howard L. Hedden, Administrator de bonis non of the Estate of Henry Foster, Deceased, Appellant; Emily E. Kern et al., Respondents.

Present — Close, P. J., Cars-well, Johnston, Adel and Taylor, JJ.
